thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Armstrong Flooring Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.80

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Armstrong Flooring Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.80
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Armstrong Flooring Inc:
* ARMSTRONG FLOORING REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 SALES $262.7 MILLION VERSUS $271.7 MILLION * FOR FULL YEAR 2018, COMPANY EXPECTS ADJUSTED EBITDA TO BE IN RANGE OF $70 MILLION TO $80 MILLION
* COMPANY EXPECTS CAPITAL EXPENDITURES TO BE IN RANGE OF $40 MILLION TO $45 MILLION FOR FULL YEAR 2018
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.18, REVENUE VIEW $266.7 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
